related_questions.question: What is a travel app?
related_questions.snippet: A travel application can cater to travelers going on any type of holiday and can meet any user need. Consumers want to create itineraries, access travel guides, and book flights and hotel rooms conveniently. Your travel technology provider can translate whatever service you want to deliver into a mobile app.
